Title: AN ACT TO REPEAL ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND FIFTY-THREE AND RESTORE SUBSECTION (G) OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND TWENTY-SEVEN.
Data:
[ Act No. 3668, December 08, 1929 ]
AN ACT TO REPEAL ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND FIFTY-THREE AND RESTORE SUBSECTION (G) OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND TWENTY-SEVEN.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Act Numbered Thirty-four hundred and fifty-three is hereby repealed and subsection (g) of Act Numbered Thirty-four hundred and twenty-seven is restored as it was before its amendment by said Act Numbered Thirty-four hundred and fifty-three: Provided, That the municipality of Dapitan, Province of Zamboanga, shall refund all preliminary expenses properly and legally incurred so far by the municipality of Dipolog or its inhabitants, by voluntary contributions, for the construction of the hospital referred to in Act Numbered Thirty-four hundred and fifty-three.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, December 8, 1929.
